mapper.select: select q.id, q.questions_code questionsCode, q.questions_title questionsTitle, q.questions_type questionsType, o.id optionId, o.`option_name` optionName, o.sort sort from questions q inner join exams_questions eq on eq.questions_code = q.questions_code inner join `options` o on o.questions_code = q.questions_code where eq.exams_code = #{examsCode}
